long_description: Forget those bulky life preservers from yesteryear! Designed to work with the high seat backs of many kayaks, the Ronny PFD from Astral features a lightweight ventilated design for comfort. Durable polyethylene foam delivers high flotation with weight savings. Nylon outer shell provides superior abrasion resistance and durability; mesh liner enhances breathability. Large mesh pocket conveniently store essentials, and quick-access lash tab offers quick access to a paddling knife or safety radio (not included). Dial in the fit of the Astral Ronny PFD using the adjustable webbing side straps and adjustable shoulder straps. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light; convertible beverage pocket.
short_description: Forget those bulky life preservers from yesteryear! Designed to work with the high seat backs of many kayaks, the Ronny PFD from Astral features a lightweight ventilated design for comfort.
